allow: Bash(python3 -c "import json; q=json.load\(open\(''.claude/pipeline/queue.json''\)\); print\(f''queue.json: valid JSON, {len\(q[""steps""]\)} steps''\); [print\(f''  Step {s[""step_number""]}: {s[""agent""]} \({s[""status""]}\)''\) for s in q[''steps'']]")

Bash(py -3.14 -c "import json; q=json.load\(open\(''.claude/pipeline/queue.json''\)\); print\(f''queue.json: valid JSON, {len\(q[""steps""]\)} steps''\); [print\(f''  Step {s[""step_number""]}: {s[""agent""]} \({s[""status""]}\)''\) for s in q[''steps'']]")
